category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enter your BYO App ID from Google Play, to be used on Android device. E.g. “com.quoord.tapatalkpro.activity”;
{literal}E.g. “Follow {your_forum_name} with {app_name} for [os_platform]”. Do not change the [os_platform] tag as it is displayed dynamically based on user’s device platform.{/literal}
Tapatalk will show a one time welcoming screen to mobile users to download the free app, the screen will contain your forum logo and branding only, with a button to get the free app.
Enter your BYO product ID in Apple App Store, to be used on iOS device.
Enter your BYO App URL from Amazon App Store, to be used on Kindle Fire device. E.g. “http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.quoord.tapatalkpro.activity”.
